item.title: Adding bonuses to items
item.dc:creator: @suikodenscape suikodenscape
item.description:
@suikodenscape wrote:

Ok if it’s not a custom item then go to item.cfg and search that item. (MAKE SURE TO USE TAB TO SPACE IF YOUR ADDING A NEW ITEM TO ITEM.CFG!)

But anyways, search the item and here is an example.

item = 11331 God_Dagger Dagger_Of_The_God’s 1000000000 1000000000 1000000000 0 113 85 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 113 9

Colors are the same, read in order from bonuses to the end of attack bones then Colors reset for each type of bonus.

Ok these are Prices in shops

Attack Bonuses
This is stabb bonus
THis is Slash bonus (one of the main to hit high numbers)
THis is crush bonus
THis is Magic bonus
THis is Range bunus

Strength Bonuses
Stabb Bonus
THis is Slash bonus (one of the main to Increase defence)
THis is crush bonus
THis is Magic bonus
THis is Range bunus

Other bonuses
Strength bonus, another main one to hit higher.
Prayer Bonus

Read full topic

item.title: Adding bonuses to items
item.dc:creator: @checkmeup checkmeup
item.description:
@checkmeup wrote:

Items.cfg
its like

item = 14563	Zamorak_Cloak	        Zamorak_Cloak.	600000	600000	600000	0	0	0	4	0	0	0	0	0	4	0	4	0	0	0	0	0

the 0’s and 4’s are the bonuses
the 600000 is how much its cost and sells

Read full topic
